about.heading: Passionate Full-Stack Developer
about.description1: Graduate with a Master's degree in Software Engineering from Abderrahmane Mira University of Béjaia, I am a full-stack developer with solid expertise in modern web development.
about.description2: Currently working at Tech Instinct since June 2023, I participate in the development and maintenance of complex web applications, working across the entire technical stack, from front-end to back-end.
